title: Sophisticated Hefei Hideaway with Rooftop Garden & Indoor Swimming Pool
description: Discover one of China's 'National Park Cities' from Crowne Plaza Hefei Rongqiao, an IHG Hotel, a sophisticated escape surrounded by misty green mountains, glimmering lakes and sprawling parks. During your stay, take a dip in the tranquil indoor swimming pool, ascend to the rooftop garden for some fresh air and mind-bending city views, or enjoy a tipple or two in the Lobby Lounge. Feeling peckish? Feast on Chinese specialties at the ground-floor restaurant, or fill your plate at the buffet.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Hefei Rongqiao, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.318 Suzhou North Road, Lu Yang District, Hefei 230001, China

title: Hefei Urban Escape near Botanical Gardens and Shushan Lake
description: In the heart of Shushan, Crowne Plaza Hefei, an IHG Hotel is an urban refuge with convenient access to verdant forest and garden landscapes. Energise your body and mind at the fitness centre and indoor pool. Dine on Cantonese cuisine at Jade Chinese Restaurant, international dishes at the Fiesta Cafe, or indulge in a refreshing beer at the Brew House. When adventure calls, explore charming Hefei to discover heritage sites, leafy parks and vibrant shopping streets.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Hefei, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Building A, 598 Huangshan Road, Hefei 230088, China

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Resort Chaohu Hot Spring
title: Chaohu Hot Spring Stay Minutes from China's Bantang Hot Springs
description: Boasting sweeping mountain views and lush foliage, Holiday Inn Resort Chaohu Hot Spring, an IHG Hotel, is a tranquil retreat mere minutes from the Bantang Hot Springs. Revitalise body and mind in thermal springs, navigate the looming stalactites of Ziwen Cave for a spot of underground adventure, or choose to cool off in the indoor swimming pool. Sample local delicacies at Terrance Garden restaurant before soaking until your heart's content at the onsite hot spring.
location_description: Holiday Inn Resort Chaohu Hot Spring, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 128 Tangshan Road, Chaohu Economic Development Zone, Hefei, Anhui, 238000, China

title: Hefei Lakefront Urban Retreat with Onsite BBQ Restaurant & Peaceful Private Garden
description: Where lakeside retreat meets cosmopolitan city living, the InterContinental Hefei, an IHG Hotel, offers the best of both worlds. On the banks of park-fringed Swan Lake, the hotel offers a serene pocket in a buzzing business district, with a peaceful private garden and indoor swimming pool. Between adventures, head to Tsingtao 1903 restaurant - the perfect spot to enjoy a Qingdao beer, BBQ feast and live entertainment - or for Cantonese and Sichuan fare, dine at Cai Feng Lou Chinese Restaurant.
offer_address: No 888 Qianshan Road, Zhengwu Distric, Hefei City, Anhui Province, 230031, China
